sentence.Network_en: The invaders rapaciously plundered the resources of other countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 侵略者贪婪地掠夺别国的资源.

sentence.Network_en: He had so rapaciously desired and so obtusely expected to find her alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强烈渴望并且愚蠢地希望自己能够发现她一人独处的机会.

sentence.Network_en: In the areas under his occupation the enemy has been rapaciously plundering manpower and material resources.
sentence.Network_cn: 在敌占区,敌人实行了无穷尽的人力、物力的掠夺.

The invaders rapaciously plundered the resources of other countries ., 侵略者贪婪地掠夺别国的资源.

list.abs: But Mr Stone is more interested in skewering rapacious financiers than rash homeowners ., 但是斯通先生更感兴趣的是去讥讽贪婪的金融家 , 而不是冲动的物业购买者.
贪 greedy贪食 rapacious appetite贪食而不运 rapacious appetite and non-movement of food.
allotment 小菜地rapacious market 掠夺性市场背景知识：西方国家由于强调环境保护，呼吁禁止燃烧fossil fuel,所以有的发电厂的周围就会种植.
the hunters drove this rapacious beast from his den into the open ., 猎人们将这只贪婪的野兽从窝里赶出来.
